content:
Option 1 worked! I think this is a good time to transition to new chat. Can you make this final update to the artifact making sure all relevant service accounts are listed and updated implementation tracker/next steps for new chat? Thanks for all your help! We're fixing critical infrastructure and moving this forward!
Welcome to Cloud Shell! Type "help" to get started.
To set your Cloud Platform project in this session use `gcloud config set project [PROJECT_ID]`.
You can view your projects by running `gcloud projects list`.
jesselarose@cloudshell:~$ gcloud iam service-accounts add-iam-policy-binding "github-actions-sa@ai-execution-system.iam.gserviceaccount.com" \
  --project="ai-execution-system" \
  --role="roles/iam.workloadIdentityUser" \
  --member="principal://iam.googleapis.com/projects/711898853198/locations/global/workloadIdentityPools/github-actions-pool/subject/repo:palios-taey/palios-taey-nova:ref:refs/heads/main"
Updated IAM policy for serviceAccount [github-actions-sa@ai-execution-system.iam.gserviceaccount.com].
bindings:
- members:
  - principal://iam.googleapis.com/projects/711898853198/locations/global/workloadIdentityPools/github-actions-pool/subject/repo:palios-taey/palios-taey-nova:ref:refs/heads/main
  role: roles/iam.workloadIdentityUser
etag: BwYwFq1GRUk=
version: 1
